channel.title: Need help making starter packs!
channel.description: i am using phonescape, there is no starter, is there a TUT for starter?? please help

item.title: Need help making starter packs!
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

[quote=“iBoot, post:4, topic:44625”]Easy

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(ID, AMOUNT); addItem(ID, AMOUNT); addItem(ID, AMOUNT); } sendMessage("Enjoy your free starter pack!"); }

Add the Item ID’s and amount then compile and type ::starter in game

Note: That lets them do it as many times as they want, not just once.

Also, here’s a guide on how to edit the starter invetory:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,56182.0.html[/quote]

That code is wrong, the rights needs to be 0 not 1. lol

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making starter packs!
item.dc:creator: @danielknuckles danielknuckles
item.description:
@danielknuckles wrote:

[quote=“i ownd u i, post:11, topic:44625”]this is starter pack from lunarscape v4-

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 200000000);
addItem(392, 1000000);
sendMessage(“You Have Started Your Adventure”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra starter!! :p");

        }
    }[/code]

hope i helped[/quote]

will this make it so it is only one starter per account?

And also if anyone could help with this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,338254.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making starter packs!
item.dc:creator: @patpat0000 patpat0000
item.description:
@patpat0000 wrote:

superbum there is one small error with your code so i will fix it

first add this to your custom commands

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(1037, 1); addItem(1038, 1); addItem(1040, 1); addItem(1042, 1); addItem(1044, 1); addItem(1046, 1); addItem(1048, 1); addItem(1050, 1); addItem(1053, 1); addItem(1055, 1); addItem(1057, 1); addItem(1419, 1); addItem(995, 500000); sendMessage("This is your starter pack. Enjoy your time here on PvpScape"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack!"); } }

then search for

/*MISC*/

press enter and under that add this

public int starter = 0;

that should fix the errors

Read full topic

Enjoy your time here on PvpScape"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack!"); } }

that shud work if u want u can change the item #S cuz its all the rares btw it only gives it once…so it works good…uhhh if u have any problems tell me im glad to help =)))

item.title: Need help making starter packs!
item.dc:creator: @iBoot iBoot
item.description:
@iBoot wrote:

Easy

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(ID, AMOUNT); addItem(ID, AMOUNT); addItem(ID, AMOUNT); } sendMessage("Enjoy your free starter pack!"); }

Add the Item ID’s and amount then compile and type ::starter in game

Note: That lets them do it as many times as they want, not just once.

Also, here’s a guide on how to edit the starter invetory:

moparisthebest.com

item.title: Need help making starter packs!
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

Theres 2 ways to do this.

1-Code it into something

2-Tell me what your giving for starters.In example:your giving full rune,10 santa hat,1000 blue partyhats,full black dragonhide.Now,since ALOT of people will come,spawn 1000,000 x rune legs,rune plate,rune full helm,rune kiteshield,rune wep,1000 blue phats,and full blk dhide x 10,000.Then bank that.Then,whenever someone new comes,bank a starter out and give it to them.

MORAL: spawn the stuff X anything above 500 here and bank it.Then whenever a new person comes,give one out.

In example: I’m giving out 10 santas for every neww person.I spawned 999,999,999,999 santas and banked em.Every time a new person comes,I give 10 out.

Read full topic
